TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FabricException extends System.Exception

summary.para: The base Service Fabric exception class.

remarks.para: Defines an error code property that is used to indicate the precise circumstance that caused the exception, in addition to properties defined by the base class.
